headline: Is Enphase Ready for a Turnaround After Q1 Earnings and Recent Stock Rebound?
summary: If you own or are eyeing shares in Enphase Energy, you probably know what it feels like to ride a roller coaster. The stock has tracked a path that has left investors alternately hopeful and cautious, with the past year showing a -64.4% slide, and the five-year picture still deeply in the red at -65.4%. Yet, more recently, there have been small signs of life, with a 3.4% gain over the past week and a modest 1.8% climb in the last month. It is enough to make any investor ask: is now the right...
